page.title: 11Children in Families
page.content: On July 2nd,I decided to find out the average number of children in a family and the average number of years inbetween two children that were born one after the other.I picked four junior classes from St.Lukes school.I asked each class who lived in the area we were surveying.Then at random I picked three people in each of the four classes and questioned them individually the questions I asked were:- 1)How many children in your family including you? 2)How old are your brothers and sisters and how old are you? No.1 results:-2,2,2,2,2,3,3,2,3,1,2,2. No.2 results:- 10,9 15,17,10 11,5 8 11,14 10,12 11,15 16,8 11,11 14,10,7 14,16,11 12,9 The average number for No.1 was 2 and the average number for No.2 was 3 years.
